mapper.select: SELECT bco_id, bco_cc_id, bco_co_id, construction_contract.project_name, category_outline.type_name, bco_price FROM breakdown_co JOIN construction_contract ON breakdown_co.bco_cc_id = construction_contract.cc_id JOIN category_outline ON breakdown_co.bco_co_id = category_outline.co_id WHERE bco_delete_flg = 0 AND bco_cc_id = #{bcoCcId} ORDER BY category_outline.co_id;

SELECT * FROM breakdown_co JOIN construction_contract ON breakdown_co.bco_cc_id = construction_contract.cc_id JOIN category_outline ON breakdown_co.bco_co_id = category_outline.co_id JOIN employee ON breakdown_co.bco_latest_editor = employee.code WHERE bco_id = #{bcoId} ORDER BY category_outline.co_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO breakdown_co (bco_cc_id, bco_co_id, bco_price, bco_created_at, bco_updated_at, bco_latest_editor, bco_delete_flg) VALUES (#{bcoCcId}, #{bcoCoId}, #{bcoPrice}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{bcoLatestEditor}, 0);
mapper.update: UPDATE breakdown_co SET bco_cc_id = #{bcoCcId}, bco_co_id = #{bcoCoId}, bco_price = #{bcoPrice}, bco_updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, bco_latest_editor = #{bcoLatestEditor}, bco_delete_flg = 0 WHERE bco_id = #{bcoId};
mapper.delete: UPDATE breakdown_co SET SET bco_delete_flg = 1 WHERE bco_id = #{bcoId};
